title: For computation of the tenement density, the net plot area shall be considered after deducting development plan reservations and amenity space
clause_text: For computation of the tenement density, the net plot area shall be considered after deducting development plan reservations and amenity space.
section: The Minimum Tenement Density to be achieved in S.R.S. :
